text: Enter the Dragon is a 1973 Hong Kong American action movie directed by Robert Clouse and starring Bruce Lee, John Saxon, Jim Kelly, Ahna Capri, Angela Mao, Betty Chung, Bolo Yeung, Marlene Clark. An American and Hong Kong co- production, Concord Productions Inc., Sequoia Pictures and Warner Bros.. It was distributed by Warner Bros.(international) and Golden Harvest (hk). It was the last movie Bruce Lee starred in before his death. ==Other websites== * d * Enter the Dragon at HKMDB * Category:Bruce Lee Category:1973 action movies Category:American action movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Concord Production Inc. movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Clouse Category:Movies set in Hong Kong Category:Golden Harvest distribution Category:Movies produced by Bruce Lee
title: Enter the Dragon
